SELECT id, username, `password`, nickname, `status` FROM t_user
SELECT id, username, `password`, nickname, `status` FROM t_user WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT tu.id, tu.username, tu.`password`, tu.nickname, tu.`status` FROM t_user tu LEFT JOIN t_user_role tur ON tu.id = tur.user_id LEFT JOIN t_role tr ON tur.role_id = tr.id WHERE tr.id =#{rid}

SELECT tr.`id`,tr.`name`,tr.`permission`,tr.`url` FROM `t_resource` tr LEFT JOIN `t_role_resource` trr ON tr.`id` = trr.`resource_id` LEFT JOIN `t_user_role` tur ON trr.`role_id` = tur.role_id WHERE tur.user_id = #{uid}
SELECT tr.sn FROM `t_role` tr LEFT JOIN `t_user_role` tur ON tr.`id` = tur.role_id LEFT JOIN `t_user` tu ON tur.`user_id` = tu.id WHERE tu.`id` = #{uid}
SELECT tr.`id`, tr.`name`, tr.`sn` FROM `t_role` tr LEFT JOIN `t_user_role` tur ON tr.`id` = tur.role_id LEFT JOIN `t_user` tu ON tur.`user_id` = tu.id WHERE tu.`id` = #{uid}
